message.args: linkrole linkroleDefinition linkroleName numberRootConcepts

messages.message: [rq-1205-Multiple-Root-Nodes] Presentation relationship set role ''%(linkroleName)s'' has multiple (%(numberRootConcepts)s) root nodes. XBRL allows unordered root nodes, but rendering requires ordering. They will instead be ordered by their labels. To avoid undesirable ordering of axes and primary items across multiple root nodes, rearrange the presentation relationships to have only a single root node.”

message.args: conceptTo conceptFrom linkrole linkroleDefinition linkroleName preferredLabel preferredLabelValue

messages.message: [rq-1207-Period-Type-Preferred-Label-Mismatch] In ''%(linkroleName)s'', element %(conceptTo)s has period type 'duration' but is given a preferred label %(preferredLabelValue)s when shown under parent %(parentQname)s. The preferred label will be ignored.

message.args: axis linkrole linkroleDefinition linkroleName

messages.message: [rq-1208-Axis-Requires-Domain-Child] The presentation group ''%(linkroleName)s'' contains an axis %(axis)s with no domain element children, which effectively filters out every fact

message.args: linkrole linkroleDefinition linkroleName foundMeasureSet missingMeasureSet

messages.message: [rq-1209-Presented-Units-Incomplete-Order] Units of measure %(foundMeasureSet)s were found in ''%(linkroleName)s'' but the facts presented use these additional units of measure: %(missingMeasureSet)s. Add presentation relationships to provide a definite ordering of these additional units in the columns and rows of the output.

message.args: linkrole linkroleDefinition linkroleName axisSet

messages.message: [rq-2601-All-Facts-Filtered] The presentation group ''%(linkroleName)s'' contains %(axisSet)s, which either has (have) no default member in the presentation group. Since every fact is defaulted on this (these) axe(s), all facts have been filtered out.

message.args: fact value preferredLabel startOrEnd date linkrole linkroleDefinition linkroleName

messages.message: [rq-2602-Duration-Without-Matching-Instant] In ''%(linkroleName)s'', fact %(fact)s with value %(value)s and preferred label %(preferredLabel)s, was not shown because there are no facts in a duration %(startOrEnd)s at %(date)s. Change the preferred label role or add facts.

message.args: linkrole linkroleDefinition linkroleName

messages.message: The presentation base set ''%(linkroleName)s'' is a statement of changes in equity, but it has no duration-type facts matching the instant-type facts shown. Add duration-type facts that represent the changes from instant to instant, or do not label the presentation base set a statement of changes.

message.args: linkrole linkroleDefinition linkroleName fact contextID members axis

messages.message: [rq-2604-Embedding-Command-Invalid-Domain] In ''%(linkroleName)s'', the embedded report created by the embedding textBlock fact %(fact)s with the context %(contextID)s, the domain members %(members)s are not presentation descendants of %(axis)s.

message.args: linkrole fact contextID linkroleDefinition linkroleName tokenlist

messages.message: [rq-2604-Embedding-Command-Invalid-Member-Or-Members] In ''%(linkrole)s'', the embedded report created by the embedding textBlock fact %(fact)s with the context %(contextID)s, the keywords %(tokenlist)s is not '*', a valid member qname or list of valid member qnames.

message.args: linkrole fact contextID linkroleDefinition linkroleName token position

messages.message: [rq-2604-Embedding-Command-Malformed-Axis] In ''%(linkrole)s'', the embedded report created by the embedding textBlock fact %(fact)s with the context %(contextID)s, the token %(token)s at position %(position)s in the list of tokens is malformed. This token can only be 'period', 'unit', 'primary' or identify an Axis by its namespace prefix, underscore, and element name.

message.args: linkrole fact contextID linkroleDefinition linkroleName token position

messages.message: [rq-2604-Embedding-Command-Malformed-Direction-Token] In ''%(linkrole)s'', the embedded report created by the fact %(fact)s with the context %(contextID)s, the token %(token)s, at position %(position)s in the list of tokens, is malformed. Each iterator can only start with ‘row’ or ‘column’.

message.args: linkrole fact contextID linkroleDefinition linkroleName style

messages.message: [rq-2604-Embedding-Command-Malformed-Style-Token] In ''%(linkrole)s'', the embedded report created by the embedding textBlock fact %(fact)s with the context %(contextID)s, the style keyword %(style)s is not one of ‘compact’ or ‘nodisplay’.

message.args: linkrole linkroleDefinition linkroleName fact contextID iftransposed roworcol colorrow axes

messages.message: [rq-2605-Embedding-Command-Missing-Iterator] In ''%(linkroleName)s'', the embedded report created by the embedding textBlock fact %(fact)s with the context %(contextID)s, there are no valid %(roworcol)s commands%(iftransposed)s. Change one of the %(axes)s to a %(colorrow)s or add a %(roworcol)s command with an additional axis.

message.args: linkrole linkroleDefinition linkroleName fact contextID iftransposed roworcol colorrow axes

messages.message: [rq-2605-Embedding-Command-Missing-Iterator-After-Transposition] In ''%(linkroleName)s'', the embedded report created by the embedding textBlock fact %(fact)s with the context %(contextID)s, there are no valid %(roworcol)s commands%(iftransposed)s. Change one of the %(axes)s to a %(colorrow)s or add a %(roworcol)s command with an additional axis.

message.args: linkrole linkroleDefinition linkroleName error axis embeddedCommand fact

messages.message: [rq-2606-Axis-Has-No-Order] In ''%(linkroleName)s'' the axis %(axis)s was not given an order in the presentation linkbase%(embeddedCommand)s. We arbitrarily chose an order by sorting on its label. In ''%(linkroleName)s'', the embedded report created by the fact %(fact)s with context {context}, the axis %(axis)s was not given an order in the presentation base set {embeddedrole}. The axes are being sorted by their labels.

message.args: linkrole linkroleDefinition linkroleName fact contextID

messages.message: [rq-2607-Empty-Bar-Chart] In ''%(linkroleName)s'', the embedded report created by the embedding text block fact %(fact)s with context %(contextID)s, is a bar chart figure that has zero facts. If a bar chart figure is not wanted here, consider removing this particular text block fact, otherwise, determine why all its facts are being filtered out.

message.args: linkrole linkroleDefinition linkroleName fact contextID numYears

messages.message: [rq-2608-Too-Many-Annual-Return-Facts] In ''%(linkroleName)s'', the embedded report created by the embedding textBlock fact %(fact)s with context %(contextID)s, there are %(numYears)s Annual Return Facts, but there must not be more than 20.

message.args: linkrole linkroleDefinition linkroleName fact contextID

messages.message: [rq-2609-Primary-Axis-On-Rows] In ''{linkroleName}'' the embedded report created by the embedding text block fact {fact} with context {contextID} contains an iterator “column primary” even though the definition text of {linkroleDefinition} contains the “{Elements}” qualifier. The primary axis will remain on the rows.

message.args: cube error element context axis

messages.message: In ''%(cube)s''%(error)s, the fact %(element)s with context %(context)s was filtered because the axis %(axis)s has no default.

message.args: cube error column

messages.message: In ''%(cube)s%(error)s, column %(column)s has no context.

message.args: fact context cube anchor

messages.message: Fact %(fact)s in context %(context)s in ''%(cube)s'' has an HTML anchor (%(anchor)s) that may restrict with usability of the Inline XBRL source document. Please move the HTML anchor outside of the ix:nonNumeric element.
''%(value)s'' is not a number.
The statement of equity, ''%(presentationGroup)s'', has no durations with matching beginning and ending instants.

message.args: doctype file

messages.message: Unknown XML doctype %(doctype)s in file %(file)s.
